name: HomeWiseIndia
overview: NetAmbit Homewise is the real estate distribution arm of the NetAmbit group. We have tie-ups with more than 30 top developers across the country. Currently operating in the Delhi NCR region we have plans to expand our footprint throughout the country in the near future. We provide wide range of residential and commercial projects from the leading developers. We provide you the convenience of “Personalized services home delivered” which is also the mantra Netambit Homewise lives by. We are there for you at every step and would come to your doorstep to serve and meet any of your requirements. Buying your dream home through Netambit Homewise ensures that all the transaction are transparent , safe and secure thereby ensuring complete peace of mind.
